text.section: The Department of Insurance shall have an official seal, in the form and design as so in use and on file in the office of the Secretary of State immediately prior to June 18, 1970.
Every certificate or license issued by the commissioner shall bear the seal of the department.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 916, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 2, sec. 4, effective June 18, 1970.
